trans-unit.source: Displays a message box and terminates the application

seg-source.mrk: Displays a message box and terminates the application

target.mrk: Displays a message box and terminates the application

trans-unit.source: The string that is displayed in the message box

seg-source.mrk: The string that is displayed in the message box

target.mrk: The string that is displayed in the message box

trans-unit.source: An application calls FatalAppExit only when it is not capable of terminating any other way.

seg-source.mrk: An application calls FatalAppExit only when it is not capable of terminating any other way.

target.mrk: An application calls FatalAppExit only when it is not capable of terminating any other way.

trans-unit.source: FatalAppExit may not always free an application's memory or close its files, and it may cause a general failure of the system.

seg-source.mrk: FatalAppExit may not always free an application's memory or close its files, and it may cause a general failure of the system.

target.mrk: FatalAppExit may not always free an application's memory or close its files, and it may cause a general failure of the system.

trans-unit.source: An application that encounters an unexpected error should terminate by freeing all its memory and returning from its main message loop.

seg-source.mrk: An application that encounters an unexpected error should terminate by freeing all its memory and returning from its main message loop.

target.mrk: An application that encounters an unexpected error should terminate by freeing all its memory and returning from its main message loop.
